replies.body: lol he needs his silence back more than anything
He actually needs a buff(his silence back)

DO YOU HEAR THIS RIOT? some random on the boards gave you a 5 word declaration to just nerf a champion because they fucking said so without giving any reason, so now you must do this because he is obviously so intelligent and professional in his manner of desire to change the game to suit only them self, the king of the fucking planet, apparently....
Riot just delete every champion and the game will be balanced
